channel.title: My starter works multiple times!HELP!

item.title: My starter works multiple times!HELP!
item.dc:creator: @wc4evandeva wc4evandeva
item.description:
@wc4evandeva wrote:

Ok when I log onto my server I can do ::starter
Then I can’t do it again!
But if I log out and in I can do it agiain!
Can anyoen help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2008, 01:42:25 am[/size][hr][code]}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 500000000);
sendMessage(“The starter packet for Rapescape.”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(15330), 500000000);
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
